tasks.task_description: Add partner approval/reject functionality to admin dashboard
Add solution moderation (approve/reject) to admin dashboard
Implement partner status check in solution creation API
Update solution creation to start with 'pending' status
Update frontend to enforce partner approval before solution creation

description: Implement missing admin features and business logic for marketplace platform
context: Checked admin dashboard - it has the UI for partner approval and solution moderation but needs backend API endpoints to be implemented

Added admin Lambda function with partner approval and solution moderation endpoints. Updated catalog Lambda to check partner status before solution creation. Updated frontend to enforce partner approval requirements.

Successfully deployed infrastructure with admin Lambda function and updated frontend with partner status checks. Admin endpoints are now available at /admin/applications and /admin/solutions. Frontend enforces partner approval before solution creation.
